question:
Many working people get little or no exercise either during the working day or in their free time,and have health problems as a result.
why do many working people not get enough exercise?
what can be done about this problem
text: The majority of staffs perform less or no physical activities during their working period  or past time and it has resulted into poor well-being.The causes  for employees performing  less work-out  are too much workload and technology.While steps such as an increase in salaries and allowing demanding jobs to be done by humans can be used to curtail the problem.The essay will explain in detail the factors as well as measures to mitigate the issue in the subsequent paragraphs with examples.
